mapper.sql: id, name, unit, price, stock, remark, purchase_date, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert: insert into product (id, name, unit, price, stock, remark, purchase_date, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into product
id,
name,
unit,
price,
stock,
remark,
purchase_date,
is_delete,

mapper.update:
update product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_date = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM product WHERE is_delete=0
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO product(name, unit,price, stock, remark,purchase_date) VALUES
(#{p.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{p.price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{p.stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{p.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p.purchaseDate,jdbcType=DATE})
